input: Green is the fourth studio album by British progressive rock musician Steve Hillage. Written in spring 1977 at the same time as his previous album, the funk-inflected "Motivation Radio" (1977), "Green" was originally going to be released as "The Green Album" as a companion to "The Red Album" (the originally intended name for "Motivation Radio"). However, this plan was dropped and after a US tour in late 1977, "Green" was recorded alone, primarily in Dorking, Surrey, and in London.
